text.text_translated:
"Born in the USA" is a rock album. The music is fast and makes you move your feet. But the words in the songs have deep and important feelings.

The music is easy to remember. The songs are very strong, famous old songs. But the stories are about the dark side of the American dream. Many songs are about the problems of hard-working ordinary people. They do not become rich or famous. So they feel angry and unhappy about their lives.

For example, one song is "Glory Days". It is about people in a small town. They think about the past. They were young and had a great future. Another song is "Downbound Train". It tells the story of a young man. He loses his job. His life is ruined after this.

The artist probably knew real people like this. He writes about their lives. Maybe his life was going to be like that. But then he became a star. This album makes it clear the artist is special. He is called "the Boss". This album shows he is very good at making music.
